org.cojen.tupl.util

Class Clutch.Pack

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cojen.tupl.util.Latch
      • org.cojen.tupl.util.Clutch.Pack
  • Enclosing class:
    Clutch

    public static class Clutch.Pack
extends Latch
    Sharable object for supporting contended clutches. Memory overhead (in bytes) is proportional to (number of slots) * (number of cores). The number of slots should be at least 16, to minimize cache line contention. As a convenience, this class also extends the Latch class, but the latching features are not used here.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.cojen.tupl.util.Latch
